__e: Haven't you ever overruled a woman?
Haven't you ever laid awake at night wondering what it would be like?
Have you never in your life or travels had any encounter with any experience of what Larry the Crackpot would describe as a love life?
you said I was a "Mommy's boy," didn't you?
Why didn't you say you were a police officer when you were arrested?
Didn't you say not to leave the dining room?
Have you no respect for the dead?
Thank you, Captain. One question. Why have you no beds here?
Hey, mister, why ain't you got a car?
Could this not make you know the hate I bare you made me leave you so?

Haven't you seen enough to know that doesn't matter?

But, Medford, why didn't you mention this gold business before?
